articles.author: Jacob Oliva
articles.title: The Wild Cars From Mad Max: Fury Road Are Up For Sale - Motor1
articles.description: For car nuts, Mad Max: Fury Road is a notable film, not because of high-speed car chases but because of the amount of badassery in it involving cars.
articles.content: For car nuts, Mad Max: Fury Road is a notable film. Not because of high-speed car chases nor was it because of the wild display of spruced-up machines. It's because, in the post-apocalyptic charge in… [+1563 chars]

articles.title: 'Halloween Kills' reviews: Critics poke holes in 'one of the most brutal films ever made' - USA TODAY
articles.description: Jamie Lee Curtis reprises her role as Laurie Strode in "Halloween Kills," unveiled at Venice Film Fest. Critics are already sticking a knife in it.
articles.content:
We're barely past Labor Day, but all eyes are already on Halloween.
